videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: DAY ONE MYTHIC  The 7 hour ranked climb to fall asleep to
videos.description:
The complete, unedited climb from Platinum to Mythic rank on day one of the Standard format playing Azorius Omniscience combo in BO1 Standard.

Deck Tech video: https://youtu.be/4sjK-n-UStA?si=VVW_y7iwKAVQhLJx

Decklist - Final version - it changes throughout the climb
https://moxfield.com/decks/QTnvQg-sRESDfzOFkU501g

videos.title: Rarran rates CRAZY FINAL FANTASY mtg cards
videos.description:
Rarran and CGB dive into the world of FINAL FANTASY and predict the future of Standard by rating new Magic: The Gathering cards.
